post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Type of Assignment: Contract

Length of Assignment: 6 Months
Job Description:
•           Develops high quality working software that delivers business value
•           Follows design and coding standards and best practices
•           Works in a continuous integration environment and quickly responds to any broken builds
•           Creates and executes unit tests
•           Collaborates with QA to understand and resolve defects
•           Participates in production implementations
•           Actively participates in project meetings
•           Rally is used for requirements and defect management and Agile development standard

Mandatory Qualifications:

•           6 to 8 years of Java/J2EE Experience (JSP, Servlet, EJB)
•           Strong Oracle 8i/9i Experience, SQL, PL/SQL
•           Frameworks, J2EE Patterns and advanced J2EE topics
•           Java/JSP/EJB/HTML/XML/Portal/JSTL/Xdoclet/struts and other open source J2EE technologies

•           Very strong Java web application programming skills
•           Comfortable working in Linux environment
•           Experience with caching, clustering, and performance analysis
•           Problem analyzing and solving skills
•           Weblogic Portal and/or Integration experience a plus
•           Ant build and deployment experience
•           Must be able to work in a team environment yet be self-directed, proactive, and action-oriented
•           Must have excellent diagnostic, debugging, and troubleshooting skills
•           Ability to instruct and cultivate development skills in less experienced developers
•           Ability to quickly learn and apply new technology and languages
•           Bachelors degree in Computer Science
•           Agile development (Scrum, XP, Pair, TDD)
•           Spring, JSF, Refactoring
•           SQL Query
•           Continuous Integration experience
•           JUnit expertise and automated testing

Desirable Qualifications:

•           Aspect Oriented Programming & AspectJ


Aida Razic

Recruiter
Calian

Tel: (905) 848-2818 x257

post.title: Java/J2EE contract position($45/hour)
